;One is a sweet new love whom he met not long ago, and the other is his old-fashioned wife who has been with him for many years. Lao Wang fell into made the most difficult decision. ;He learned about this software accidentally. During the class break, several young male teachers in the office were sitting around playing with their mobile phones. He had nothing to do and walked over with a water glass: there were two people playing games, and a man named Xiao Zhang was watching from the side, holding his mobile phone sideways and tapping the corner of the screen. He accidentally discovered the "secret": countless women's faces were changing, just like changing faces in a Sichuan opera. He was very curious, smiled and patted Xiao Zhang on the shoulder, and asked if multiple blind dates are popular nowadays?

;

;“Multiple people going on a blind date? What's the meaning. "Xiao Zhang was stunned for a moment, then understood what he meant, and quickly put his phone in his pocket. The other two young teachers stopped playing games and smiled evilly as if they had a "tacit understanding":

;

;"Ouch, Mr. Zhang is probably playing "see" again. ”

;

;“‘Look’? "He said to himself while holding a glass of water. This was the first time he mentioned this sentence, but he didn't know what kind of changes this sentence would bring to his future life. Seeing his curiosity, one of the male teachers explained to him:

;

;"Teacher Wang, how do you say "take a look"?" It's just a dating app. Log in with your mobile phone number, upload a few photos, and you can match and make friends with people of different age groups around the world. Of course that's what he said, but..." When the male teacher said this, he looked at Xiao Zhang next to him with a wicked smile. But he didn't care about that. He focused entirely on the middle sentence: matching and making friends with people of different ages all over the world. He smiled while holding the tea cup and said, "You young people don't know what nonsense you are thinking." I'm going to class, you can continue chatting. ”

;

;The school bell rings. This period is Chinese self-study. He sat on the podium, flipping through an ancient Greek drama book: Euripides' "Medea." But I didn't have the patience to read it. After flipping through two pages, I turned on my phone, thinking about what the male teacher just said. "Match and make friends with people of different ages all over the world." He thought about this sentence and opened the app store unconsciously with his fingers: He heard his son say that this software comes with it and is specially used to download other software. . The time was 3:07 in the afternoon, and a boring class had just begun. He thought in his heart, why not search or download, just take a look. With this thought in mind, his finger had already opened the input box, and he wrote the word "look" with a slightly trembling hand. The next second, an orange-red software "look" appeared at the bottom. This must be it, he thought to himself. To verify, he clicked on the introduction page. Yes, the screenshot was exactly the same as Xiao Zhang's. He saw a download count on the right: more than 500 million. He was shocked that one-third of China's population of more than 1.4 billion was using this software. This situation gave him some peace of mind: more than 500 million times, one-third, excluding minors and the elderly, basically all Chinese people are using it, so one more person should be no problem. With this in mind, he clicked the download button and immediately turned off the screen and continued to read the book. In the last chapter, the angry Medea poisoned the princess and the king, killed her two sons, cut off her husband's heirs, and flew to Athens in a car. This is a sad story. He clasped the book and took out his mobile phone from his pocket: "Look" it has been downloaded.

;

;He clicked to log in and entered his mobile phone number and verification code. He was extremely nervous during the whole process and glanced at the students below from time to time. The software opened, and what came into view was a long-legged girl wearing sunglasses and long hair. This made him breathless, and he swiped hurriedly to go back. As a result, a red heart briefly appeared on the screen, and then a photo of another scantily clad woman appeared again. In desperation, he quickly pressed the button to lock the screen. The water dispenser was on the right side. He coughed and took a drink. After drinking the water, he tried to relax and reopened "Look". The woman was still standing on it, and he adjusted his glasses to study the function buttons on the interface: swiping right should mean he likes it, and swiping left seems to mean he doesn't like it. Set it at the top. After entering, there is a blank avatar, with location, age and range below. He compared it to the software he is most familiar with, "WeChat", and felt that the blank avatar should be used to allow users to insert photos. He tried adding a photo of the West Lake that was exactly the same as the WeChat avatar: it was taken when he and his wife went to Hangzhou many years ago. The system prompts that it cannot be recognized. It is not a human face. He understood that the avatar must use a human face. He stroked his beard and thought for a while, then inserted an ID photo of the labor rhythm last month. The prompt passed. He looked at his photo and felt a sudden panic in his heart. He felt that he was being interrogated, and the dozens of students below him were the judges. It happened that a student came up to ask a question at this time. He hurriedly put his cell phone in his pocket, and the trial was temporarily over.

;

;He spent the whole afternoon in a daze. During get out of class time, I swiped a total of seventy or eighty times, and when I swiped again, the system prompted a fee. He dejectedly thought that his chance to use this software was completely over, but after so many swipes, there was no match, which made him unwilling. When I returned home with a depressed mood, my wife had already prepared dinner and my son was playing games in the bedroom. Dinner was rice porridge with side dishes, stir-fried beans and eggplant stewed in oil. Everything tasted like formalin. My wife works in a local tertiary hospital in the Department of Obstetrics and Gynecology. Her hand holding the kitchen knife is as sharp as a scalpel. The braised eggplant was cut into the same strips, and he suddenly had no desire to eat it.

;

;“I won’t eat anymore. I’m going to take a shower. ”

;

;“Eat more, my son and I can’t finish it. ”The wife responded holding her rice bowl. He didn't reply, took off his shirt irritably, picked up a towel and headed to the bathroom. The water was just right, and the bathroom heater produced warm light. Just as he was enjoying the tranquility of the moment, he suddenly remembered that his phone was still outside, so he hurriedly turned off the nozzle and went out wet with a towel.

;

;“I asked you to pay attention to your image. My son and I are still eating! ”The wife shouted angrily when she saw him like this. He knew he was in the wrong but couldn't defend himself. He touched the phone and returned to the bedroom dejectedly. The house has three bedrooms and one living room. He and his wife slept in separate rooms three years ago. His wife couldn't stand his snoring, and he couldn't stand his wife's medical rigor. He and his wife both fell in love for the first time. The two families were well matched and they got married according to the decree. On the first night of his wedding, he was as nervous as he is now, anticipating what his first night would be like. Under the dim light, he could no longer hold back and rushed towards his wife in a hurry. But when he took off his clothes and treated her naked, he couldn't find any clue. What made him even more confused was that his wife stood up coldly, sat upright on the bed and explained medical knowledge to him: what is the labia, where is the hymen, and how to distinguish the urethra and vagina. That night, he sat on the bed and listened to his wife's explanation, and he could no longer feel any excitement in his heart. Now he was lying on the bed, holding the phone and feeling a warmth in his lower body. He felt that he was young again. So he opened his phone and what he saw was a message at the top: Congratulations, you have a new match. He was overjoyed and hurriedly entered to "take a look". Sure enough, he became friends with a woman who looked pretty and had a backpack on her shoulders. But he was not very happy. This was not a woman, it was clearly a girl. The age at the bottom was written eighteen, which was similar to his son. He suddenly felt guilty. He wanted to give up this first opportunity, but he didn't know how to do it. He lay in bed and thought for a long time, and finally decided that since they were matched, it was fate, so even if he refused, it would be better to talk about it. So he opened the chat box, thought about it and typed "Hello", followed by a smiley face. As soon as the message was sent, before the other party could reply, the system prompt appeared: The other party has been unpaired with you.

;

;This is how the good mood of the whole day ends. He put down his cell phone irritably, feeling sleepy, covering his head with the quilt and falling asleep. That night he had a dream in which Medea came to assassinate him with a scalpel. When he woke up the next day, he found that he was covered in sweat and looked exhausted. He got up and washed his face. It was the weekend, his son was playing games in the living room, and his wife had already gone to the hospital for a shift. He saw his son holding a handle and moving it left and right in front of the TV. On the screen was a moving car. He told his son to stop playing and he wanted to watch TV.

;

;“Dad, search for what you want to see on your phone. ”

;

;“It’s inconvenient, dad just wants to watch TV for a while. ”

;

;“Okay, wait until I finish this fight. ”The son said. He had no choice but to sit on the sofa and wait for his son to finish playing the game. If the wife is at home, she will definitely yell at her son. He feels that his son's appearance has attracted the discordant fire between the couple, so he feels sorry for his son and respects his son's hobbies, even games. He turned on his phone and thought that he had not uninstalled it yet and "take a look", but unexpectedly found that he could still swipe right: He understood that this software has a fixed number of opportunities every day. He was very excited and decided to study the software in detail. By the time his son finished playing the game, he had mastered the software's rules and decided to change the age and range of matches. The advantages of doing this are, first, you can match friends with similar ages, and second, you can reduce the number of people around you meeting each other. Because just a second ago, he found a photo of Teacher Li in the office. She and her husband divorced three years ago and are still unmarried. As soon as I finished doing this, my son came over unexpectedly. He quickly stuffed his cell phone into his pocket, and his son threw the remote control to him, then went back to the room without saying anything more.

;“Nothing, just something in the class. ” He answered nonchalantly, feeling the smell of garlic rush into his nose. Datura will definitely not do this. Now, with the rapid development of the Internet, everyone at home can recognize him. He is proud to have a friend like a performance artist.

Thinking of this, an evil thought sprouted in his mind: his wife's mobile phone does not have a password all year round. When his wife wasn't paying attention, he secretly picked up the phone and rummaged through it. He didn't know whether to be disappointed or lucky to find that his wife's phone was extremely clean and there was nothing unusual about it. After doing this, he suddenly felt disgusted with himself: his wife was not a bad person. Although they had been together for so many years, although they were not suitable, her wife had not done anything to feel sorry for him. But just like his son, Datura was there, and he couldn't stop the thoughts that were about to come to him. Datura lives in Hainan, and he lives in Xi'an, one in the north and the other in the south. At first he thought that the distance of time and space would make the relationship between the two more controllable. But he slowly discovered that distance was not only an obstacle, but also an extension of desire. After all, he is a family man, and if he continues, he is afraid that the outcome will be out of control. When it comes to love, he is powerless and decisive. Moreover, his situation is no longer just love, but family love, father's love and life choices. Thinking of this, he suddenly began to suffer from insomnia: after saying good night to Datura every night, he always stayed awake for a long time, with many emotions flooding in his heart.

;

;On those days when he was extremely anxious, Datura suddenly sent him a WeChat message, which was a voice message. Datura used a 60-second speech to cry out about how David had domestically abused her that day and called her a loser who couldn't have children. Datura is a non-marriage person, and her union with David has reached her limit. She does not want to cross another life between them. She was determined to divorce David. She would not have to worry about child custody, and her property would be divided equally, so she could get out easily. He listened carefully to the voice three times and understood that it was an olive branch extended to him by a middle-aged lady who was about to be divorced. Yes, lady. He had evil thoughts that were beyond love. He didn't think he would be like this, but he still thought about it. He thought for a long time and finally replied: Datura, please calm down first. Domestic violence is certainly unforgivable, but divorce is not a trivial matter after all. We will discuss it later. When the message was delivered, he suddenly admired himself for cleverly placing himself in a favorable position.

;

;In the following days, he continued to comfort Datura, and Datura kept talking about divorce and meeting. To be honest, he was not ready to meet Datura, partly because of the distance and partly because of time. He couldn't carry his wife behind his back and spend at least a day meeting Datura in Hainan, so the best way was to let Datura come to him. But as a man, he felt that there was no way to say such words. They have already made the decision to divorce for me. Don’t I even have the determination to meet them?  

;

;In this way, ideas began to brew in his mind. What he didn’t know was that it only took less than three months from the beginning to now. On October 1st, the National Day, he made up his mind to give Datura a surprise and bought a direct flight ticket to Hainan. He had already thought of the reasons. My wife and son are staying at home, and I have to go to Hainan to meet old friends. I haven't written for several years, so I took the opportunity to accumulate some materials.

;

;That day was the morning of the first day of National Day.妻子手拿遥控器表示没有异议，就在这时，儿子猫着腰偷偷向他招手。他有点纳闷，跟着儿子回到卧室。儿子坐下，转了下电竞椅，告诉他自己想通了，决定继续跟茜茜好下去：

;

;“爸，我后来想了想，觉得你说得挺对，茜茜真的挺好，我不该辜负人家。还有我觉得吧，网恋毕竟太玄，咋可能有现实靠谱。 ”儿子的每一句话此刻都直插他的心扉。回到自己卧室，离登机还有两小时，他思虑良久，打开微信，在输入框手写出了以下一行文字：

;
;
; 
;

;Datura，我觉得我们之间的关系还是太过于殊离，没有办法继续下去。

;
;

;可当他刚一写完，正准备发送，变卦再次出现。妻子在客厅喊：“怎么还不收拾东西走啊，不怕误了飞机？ ”他烦躁地喊：“马上就走！ ”接着赌气似的删掉刚才的信息，写出几个大字：

;
;
; 
;

;Datura，我马上坐飞机去找你。

;
;

;他拉起行李箱，砰的一声关门，几乎是顶着怒气走的，可他都不清楚自己为什么要生这么大气。十月的天空因为人流原因还夹杂着闷热，路上Datura发来微信：“你真的确定吗？ ? ? ”后面还跟着三个疑问和一个睁大了眼的黄脸。他坐在去往机场的出租车上，平复心情告诉Datura这是真的，他要去海南找她了，他决定了，不管与她的结局会如何，还是想去见见，去看看。他几乎是怀着无比激动颤抖的心情在回复：“是的，漂洋过海，与你相见。 ”他插上耳机，打开李宗盛那首名曲《漂洋过海来看你》。侧身望向窗外，梧桐林立，它们在飞快地倒驰中，化为了海的模样。

;

;《漂洋过海》播了三遍，出租车到达机场时，焦虑的他终于等来了Datura的信息：“真的吗，太好了，我现在正在市区做行为表演，马上回去做下准备。 ”他迅速回复道：“好的，不用怎么准备，忙完再回。对了，还是那个闹市耳光的作品吗？注意安全。 ”很快Datura发来语音，讲：“不是的，是另一个作品，也是今年最后一个，有关现代人的交流，名字叫《社交异化》。不跟你说了，我马上回去，旅途顺利喔。 ”

;

;他拖着行李箱，拿着手机站在偌大的咸阳国际机场。这次出行他选择了那身洋气的西装，行李箱内除了必备的出行用品，还带了一本精装版的《不存在的骑士》。正如Datura所言，一场美好的旅行即将开始，他在心里告诫自己，事已至此，已然没有退路。儿子马上就要高考，十八岁后他的人生将由他自己来决定。与妻子二十年来的生活也该结束了，彼此虽然坎坷，不过也算夫妻一场。离登记还有不到三十分钟，儿子发来一条微信：“预祝老爸旅行快乐。 ”后头加了一个咧嘴笑的黄脸。他看到这句话，内心突然一阵伤感，一滴眼泪不争气的地掉了下来。他擦擦眼泪，回复儿子：“好的，爸爸不在的时候照顾好妈妈。 ”气氛突然有些悲凉，机场播报航班马上起飞，他告诫自己不能这样，长舒口气，调出Datura的头像，准备告诉她自己马上登机。然而就在这时，异样的事情发生了：他的消息发送不出去，首部有一个鲜红的感叹号。

;

;他慌了，再次尝试，依旧打不通。刹那间，不祥的预感在他脑海蒸腾。他飞快点击那个好久不用的“看看”，给Datura发送信息，屏幕上却显示：对方已和您解除匹配。此时他感觉天旋地转，周遭一切迅即倒流，他懵倒在了地上。而就在这时，微信传来一条新的信息，是妻子发来的：

;
;
; 
;

;老公路上注意安全，到海南时记得跟我讲。

;
